Object Shape: Cone, Circle, Cylinder, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Unknown
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was aprox 11 pm at night and i was laying in bed looking out my bedroom window at the woods. I saw what i first thought was the moon..until i watched it desend to the ground ..about 20 to 30 min later there were little flashing lights everywhere..in the field with my horses around my house and in the woods ..like the were looking for something ..i was terrified but extremely fasinated and curious at the same time ..so i began taking pictures ..first from my bedroom window ..then i went outside..they knew i was out there and seemed to be scared of me..they didnt move once i was outside..not long after..i herd tree braches breaking and i witnessed their aircraft take off out of the woods..its lights were bright blue and flashing ..it hovered for a moment then gone in a flash ...i have a picture...i told a few family members and friends about my experience ..they thought i was crazy ..then i showed them pictures ..can you guys please help ..i am sending some pictures ...but i have many more...this happened aprox 8 weeks ago...i havent felt right since...please help!!...you may contact me anytime via phone or email....thank you for your time.
Summary: witnessed flashing lights ..witnessed take off of craft ..witnessed alien activity ...have many pictures .
trends: There has been one other sighting in Stewartstown
There were no other sightings in Stewartstown on or around July 18th 2013
